sentences.sContent: I've had people keep some of the ashes in a phial on a key-chain so they can keep their pet close to them.
sentences.sContent_eng: I've had people keep some of the ashes in a phial on a key-chain so they can keep their pet close to them.
sentences.sCn: 我的做法是把一点儿宠物的骨灰封在小玻璃瓶里并挂在钥匙链上，这样主人会感到宠物永远和他们在一起。

sentences.sContent: "Oh, that, " said the old man, opening the drawer in the kitchen table, and taking out a tiny, rather dirty-looking phial. "That is just a dollar."
sentences.sContent_eng: "Oh, that, " said the old man, opening the drawer in the kitchen table, and taking out a tiny, rather dirty-looking phial. "That is just a dollar."
sentences.sCn: “那个嘛，”老人打开抽屉，拿出一瓶小小的，脏脏的瓶子，“只要一美元。”

trans.tranOther: a small bottle, especially for liquid medicines
